content.question: Which of the following issues from the past ten years have led to significant public protests in Russia?

choices.label: The firing of Prime Minister Medvedev by President Putin
The nationalization of the oil industry by the government
The election fraud and corruption of the government

content.answer: The election fraud and corruption of the government

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

topic.text: 4.5: Impact of Social Movements and Interest Groups

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
